title: Development of Composite Alginate Bead Media with Encapsulated Sorptive Materials and Microorganisms to Bioaugment Green Stormwater Infrastructure

Green Stormwater Infrastructure (GSI) is being increasingly implemented in urban areas as a nature-based solution to improve water quality and increase groundwater recharge. Nevertheless, GSI is inefficient at removing many...
